briefdescription.para: COC callback events.
Initialize L2C subsystem.
Initialize L2C for operation as a Bluetooth LE master.
Initialize L2C for operation as a Bluetooth LE slave.

description.para: Register and send data over a CID

briefdescription.para: called by the L2C client, such as ATT or SMP, to register for the given CID.

parameterdescription.para: Callback function for L2CAP data received for this CID.
Callback function for control events for this CID.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t cid, uint16_t handle, uint16_t len, uint8_t *pL2cPacket)
memberdef.name: L2cDataReq

briefdescription.para: Send an L2CAP data packet on the given CID.

parameterdescription.para: The connection handle. The client receives this handle from DM.
The length of the payload data in pPacket.

memberdef.argsstring: (uint16_t handle, uint8_t code, uint16_t len, uint8_t *pParam)
memberdef.name: L2cDmSigReq

briefdescription.para: Build and send a signaling packet.
Initialize L2C connection oriented channel subsystem.

Register to use a connection oriented channel, as either a channel acceptor, initiator, or both. If registering as channel acceptor then the PSM is specified. After registering a connection can be established by the client using this registration instance.

simplesect.para: Registration instance ID or L2C_COC_REG_ID_NONE if registration failed.

briefdescription.para: Deregister and deallocate a connection oriented channel registration instance. This function should only be called if there are no active channels using this registration instance.
Set the channel accept callback.
Initiate a connection to the given peer PSM.

simplesect.para: Local CID or L2C_COC_CID_NONE none if failure.

briefdescription.para: Disconnect the channel for the given CID.
Send an L2CAP data packet on the given connection oriented CID.

parameterdescription.para: The length of the payload data in pPacket.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, l2cCocRegId_t regId, uint16_t psm, uint16_t credits, uint8_t numChan)
memberdef.name: L2cCocEnhancedConnectReq

briefdescription.para: Send a request to open enhanced credit based channels.

parameterdescription.para: The initial number of credits for each CID channel.
The number of channels to create - L2C_MAX_EN_CHAN max.

simplesect.para: false if unable make request, else true.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint16_t mtu, uint16_t mps, uint8_t numChan, uint16_t *pChanList)
memberdef.name: L2cCocEnhancedReconfigReq

briefdescription.para: Send a request to reconfigure enhanced credit based channels.

parameterdescription.para: The maximum transmission unit of each source CID channel.
The maximum payload size on each source CID channel.
The number of channels to create (1 to L2C_MAX_EN_CHAN).
A list of local CID to reconfigure (L2C_MAX_EN_CHAN channels, set unused to 0).

simplesect.para: false if unable make request, else true.

briefdescription.para: Register an authorization callback.

simplesect.para: If the authorization callback function returns L2C_CONN_FAIL_PEND_AUTHORIZ, then the higher layer shall subsequently call L2cCocAuthorize to authorize the pending request.

briefdescription.para: Called to authorize a pending enhanced channel requests on a PSM.

parameterdescription.para: true if channel creation is authorized, else false.

simplesect.para: This function shall be called to authorize a channel req after L2C_CONN_FAIL_PEND_AUTHORIZ is returned by the authorization callback function (see L2cCocRegisterAuthorCback).

briefdescription.para: Called to notify the L2CAP a connection is authentic during a pending enhanced channel requests.

parameterdescription.para: true if channel creation is authorized, else false.

simplesect.para: If authenPendSupp was set true in the call to L2cCocChanPendingInit, then this function shall be called by the application after the SMP security procedure. This function will complete a pending enhanced channel request on the given channel.

briefdescription.para: Initialize enhanced channel request auth pending.

parameterdescription.para: true if authentication pending is supported.

simplesect.para: If setting authenPendSupp true, L2cCocAuthenticate shall be called from the application after pairing or encryption is complete to complete channel requests that are pending authentication.

briefdescription.para: For testing purposes only.
For testing purposes only.
For internal use only. This function is called by DM to send an L2CAP connection update request.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to the connection specification structure.

briefdescription.para: For internal use only. This function is called by DM to send an L2CAP connection update response.

parameterdescription.para: Identifier value previously passed from L2C to DM.

description.para: Connection oriented channel data confirm status values

detaileddescription.para: Minimum packet payload MTU for LE
L2CAP LE SDU data header length

description.para: BLE defined Command rejection reason codes

sectiondef.header: L2CAP Connection Parameter Update Result Codes

detaileddescription.para: Connection refused insufficient encryption key size
Connection refused source CID already allocated

description.para: Proprietary codes not sent in any L2CAP packet.

sectiondef.header: L2CAP Enhanced Connection Reconfigure Result Codes

detaileddescription.para: Enhanced Reconfiguration refuded - cannot reduce MTU.
Enhanced Reconfiguration refuded - cannot reduce MPS on more than one channel.

briefdescription.para: Connection oriented channel registration ID.

memberdef.definition: typedef void(* l2cDataCback_t) (uint16_t handle, uint16_t len, uint8_t *pPacket)
memberdef.name: l2cDataCback_t

briefdescription.para: This callback function sends a received L2CAP packet to the client.

parameterdescription.para: The length of the L2CAP payload data in pPacket.

briefdescription.para: This callback function sends control messages to the client.
This callback function sends data and other events to connection oriented channels clients.

memberdef.definition: typedef uint8_t(* l2cCocAcceptCb_t) (dmConnId_t connId, uint8_t numChans)
memberdef.name: l2cCocAcceptCb_t

briefdescription.para: This callback function asks clients of connection oriented channels if a given number of channels can be created on the PSM.

simplesect.para: number of channels permitted by client.

memberdef.definition: typedef uint16_t(* l2cCocAuthorCback_t) (dmConnId_t connId, l2cCocRegId_t regId, uint16_t psm)
memberdef.name: l2cCocAuthorCback_t

briefdescription.para: This callback function is used for authorization of connection oriented channels.

parameterdescription.para: The PSM of the registration instance.

simplesect.para: L2C_CONN_SUCCESS if authorization is successful, any other value for failure.

briefdescription.para: Invalid channel registration ID for connection oriented channels.
Invalid channel ID for connection oriented channels.
Invalid signal identifier.
Max number of channels per enhanced connection request.
Start of L2CAP payload in an HCI ACL packet buffer.
L2CAP signaling packet base length, including HCI header.
L2CAP LE SDU packet base length, including HCI header.
Signaling response code flag.
